articles.title: India rejects China's renaming of 30 places in Himalayan border state - Reuters India
articles.description: India rejected China's renaming of about 30 places in its northeastern Himalayan state of Arunachal Pradesh on Tuesday, calling the move "senseless" and reaffirming that the border province is an "integral" part of India.
